note.p: Birth: Laon, Aisne, France (16 April or 16 August 1744)
Death: Castellon de la Plana, Spain (20 September 1804 or 20 September 1805)
Career: Observer, sureveyor and computer under Lalande; made two voyages surveying coast of France; Director of the Observatory, Paris
Notes: DSB gives birth and death dates as 16 August 1744 and 20 September 1804, and is source for birth and death places.
